mapper.sql: nannyId, nannyAvatar, nannyName, nannySex, nannyStatus, nannyType, nannyLevel, nannyPhone, provinceId, cityId, areaId, streetId, nannyAddress, nannyIdCard, nannyBirthday, nannyAge, nannyAnimalSign, nannyNation,nannyOrigin, nannyHeight, nannyWeight, salaryBank, salaryCard, expectSalary, nannyBuyoutStatus, nannyBuyoutDate, nannyAgencyFees, payment, validDate, remark, createTime, modifyTime, isDel
mapper.select: SELECT j.nannyId,j.nannyAvatar,j.createTime,j.nannyName,j.nannyIdCard,j.nannyPhone,j.nannyAge,j.nannySex,d1.INFO AS nannySexInfo, j.provinceId,d2.provinceName AS provinceIdInfo,j.cityId,d3.cityName AS cityIdInfo,j.areaId,d4.areaName AS areaIdInfo,j.streetId,d5.streetName AS streetIdInfo,j.remark FROM j_nanny_info j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID = j.nannySex LEFT JOIN j_province d2 ON d2.provinceId = j.provinceId LEFT JOIN j_city d3 ON d3.cityId = j.cityId LEFT JOIN j_area d4 ON d4.areaId = j.areaId LEFT JOIN j_street d5 ON d5.streetId = j.streetId WHERE j.nannyId = #{0}

SELECT j.nannyId,j.nannyStatus,d1.INFO AS nannyStatusInfo,j.nannyLevel,d2.INFO AS nannyLevelInfo,j.nannyAgencyFees,j.payment,d3.INFO AS paymenyInfo, j.expectSalary,j.validDate,j.salaryCard,j.salaryBank FROM j_nanny_info j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID = j.nannyStatus LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON d2.ID = j.nannyLevel LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d3 ON d3.ID = j.payment WHERE j.nannyId = #{0}

SELECT j.nannyHeight,j.nannyWeight,j.nannyOrigin,d1.INFO AS nannyOriginInfo,j.nannyNation,d2.INFO AS nannyNationInfo,j.nannyAnimalSign,d3.INFO AS nannyAnimalSignInfo,j.nannyEducation,d4.INFO AS nannyEducationInfo FROM j_nanny_info j LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID = j.nannyOrigin LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON d2.ID = j.nannyNation LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d3 ON d3.ID = j.nannyAnimalSign LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d4 ON d4.ID = j.nannyEducation WHERE j.nannyId = #{0}
